name: Retro Future Runner for Arturia Pigments
name_original: Retro Future Runner for Arturia Pigments
description:
Retro Future Runner is a cyberpunk inspired preset library for Arturia Pigments with 34 different patches.  A variety of digital and analog inspired sounds perfect for scoring a futuristic heist or landing an underground pop-hit.

Bass:

Bite the Pipe, Dark Perfect, Thinner Line, Adios Jupiter, Bass Runner, Sub Station

Percussion:

High Hat, Open High Hat, 808 Kick, Rampage Drums, Synth Snare, Tambourine Ping, Sunset Drums

Brass stabs and Pads:

Override, Digital Fanfare, Infinite Skyline

Keys/ Plucked/ Piano:

Aerial Traffic, No Memory, Out on the Edge, Pluck Synthetique, Chicago Typeface, Shattered Planes

Leads:

Trance the Gate, Acid Love, Get Yr Rave On, Light Tracer, Guitar Shreddin'

Pads:

Analogue Runner, Neon Rain, RAM Fault

Choir:

Singularity Voices

Creative SFX:

Design Washer
